scripts.start: yarn run docker:start & yarn run s3:start & yarn run web:graphqlschema:monitor & yarn run web:start & yarn run graphql:start & yarn run lambda:start
scripts.test: yarn run parent:test && yarn run graphql:test && yarn run lambda:test && yarn run web:test && yarn run dynamodb:test
scripts.all:install: yarn install && yarn run s3:install && yarn run web:install && yarn run graphql:install && yarn run dynamodb:install && yarn run lambda:install
scripts.graphql:start: cd ./graphql && yarn run start 2>&1 | node ../scripts/log-prefix.js [graphql] green
scripts.lambda:start: cd ./lambda && yarn run start 2>&1 | node ../scripts/log-prefix.js [lambda] red
scripts.web:graphqlschema:monitor: nodemon --watch graphql/data/schema.graphql --exec "yarn run web:graphqlschema:update" 2>&1 | node scripts/log-prefix.js [node] grey
scripts.web:start: cd ./web && yarn run start 2>&1 | node ../scripts/log-prefix.js [web] blue
scripts.s3:start: cd ./s3 && yarn run start | node ../scripts/log-prefix.js [s3] yellow
